sense.def:
To go to one place via another
pomeni, da gremo do svojega cilja skozi neki drug kraj.

seg.quote: ...a ticket to Washington via Frankfurt and New York.

sense.def:
Izraz
via
pomeni tudi, da nekaj naredimo ali dosežemo tako, da uporabimo določeno stvar ali osebo.

seg.quote: ...the transmission of television pictures via satellite.
It was so kind of you to send that message via Toby.
